product_name: Sea to Summit Dry Mesh Duffle - Large
long_description: The large Sea to Summit Dry Mesh Duffle uses a mesh area to store wet gear, and a waterproof area to store dry gear. Heavy-duty mesh and nylon are lightweight and durable. The Sea to Summit Dry Mesh Duffle features double-stitched, taped seams to enhance protection from moisture. Heavy-duty Hypalon(R) roll closure effectively seals dry compartment from moisture. Tough base is ideal for boat use; base is made of PVC-free materials. 2 in. webbing handles and 10mm zippers stand up to heavy use.
short_description: The large Sea to Summit Dry Mesh Duffle uses a mesh area to store wet gear, and a waterproof area to store dry gear.
